translations: 突出，强调；使显著，醒目；用荧光笔标记；挑染（highlight 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: When a candidate is elected his or her name will be highlighted in bold.
sentences.translation: 当候选人被选中时，他或她的名字就用粗体来突出。

sentences.sentence: Last year Collins wrote a moving ballad which highlighted the plight of the homeless.
sentences.translation: 去年柯林斯写了一首感人的叙事诗，突出描写了无家可归者的苦境。

sentences.sentence: His remarks highlighted his own function.
sentences.translation: 他的话突出了他自己的作用。
